title: Warlock
content:
mple Weapon Proficiency Choose 2 Skill Proficiencies Pact Magic

Warlock is a Class in Baldur's Gate 3 (BG3). Warlocks primary ability is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons and Light Armour.

Bound by a pact to an all-powerful patron, warlocks trade their loyalty for supernatural abilities and unique magic.

BG3 Warlock Class Features

Hit Points at 1st Level: 8 + Constitution modifier Hit Po
